title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Physics Problem-Solving Skills Development Through Cognitive Process Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain relationships between concepts by integrating quantitative and qualitative explanations when interpreting physical phenomena
Learners can systematically analyze complex problems by applying hierarchical knowledge organization methods (principles-laws-phenomena)
Learners can recognize decision-making stages in the scientific problem-solving process and implement explicit strategies (hypothesis verification, variable control, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
